name: Breakpoint (itch) (clonethirteen)
description:
This game was made for Mini-Jam 71. The limitation for the jam was to combine 2 genres. Here I have put together the classic Breakout arcade with a top-down shooter.  The game is posted in a prototype stage with only 1 level.

How to play - 

Use A and D to move the paddle back and forth to keep the shooter from falling into the darkness. Left click on monsters to shoot them. Don't let the monsters touch you. 

I have plans to improve on this project and add some levels. Your feedback and suggestions will be greatly appreciated and this is the first game I have even released on Itch.io.
